library(whereami)
library(magrittr)
library(kableExtra)

HTML footnote

knitr::kable(head(iris,10), align = "c",format = 'html') %>%
  kableExtra::footnote(
    general_title = "Source: ",
    general = as.character(whereami(path_expand = TRUE)))
